original_text: Thy crowned are as the locusts, and thy captains as the great grasshoppers, which camp in the hedges in the cold day, but when the sun ariseth they flee away, and their place is not known where they are.
korean_text: 네 방백은 메뚜기 같고 너의 장수들은 큰 메뚜기 떼가 추운 날에는 울타리에 깃들였다가 해가 뜨면 날아감과 같으니 그 있는 곳을 알 수 없도다

sentences.original_text: Thy crowned are as the locusts
and thy captains as the great grasshoppers
which camp in the hedges in the cold day
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 추운 날에 울타리에 진을 치고

sentences.original_text: but when the sun ariseth they flee away
and their place is not known where they are
